comments:
With 3.0M4 when I right click on my plugin.xml file and select Create Ant 
Build File, I get an error dialog that says "Cannot find element" and two 
entries in the error log (below). It was working ok until I renamed the 
plugin, its directory, and the packages within it, but I can't find any 
references to the old plugin name anywhere that might be tripping it up.

The only way this exception could have been thrown is if the project in which 
we are creating the build.xml file has a model that is neither an instance of 
IPluginModel nor IFragmentModel, which is strange.
I'm suspecting that the Work In Progress OSGi option was turned on.  Is that 
the case?

Yes, this one can be closed because turning off the experimental OSGi option 
fixes it.
OSGi-support is still Work In Progress.  Marking as WONTFIX.
